    • About Zach Sikes


    Zach is the Broker/Owner of Homestead & Co. Zach developed a passion for real estate early on. He has specialized in every area of real estate and decided to pursue his dream of owning his own brokerage. He spends his time at Homestead & Co as the lead listing specialist and working on the development of the company. He enjoys the little free time he has with his wife and two daughters.
